Pre-Game Insights: Moldova will face Malta at the Stadionul Zimbru on Saturday in the opening game of their 2024-25 UEFA Nations League campaign.
The home side performed fairly well in the previous edition of the Nations League, winning four of their six group games but ultimately missed out on promotion due to goal difference.
Malta have endured a poor run of form in recent games and will be desperate to turn a corner when they return to competitive action this weekend.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The visitors had mixed results in the 2022 Nations League, winning their two games against San Marino and losing their two against Estonia to finish second in their group with six points from an obtainable 12.
The two sides last faced off in a friendly clash back in March 2016 which ended goalless.
The hosts are undefeated in their last five games in this fixture, a run stretching back to February 2004.
The visitors have managed just one clean sheet in their last eight games across all competitions.
The Tricolours were ranked 152nd in the latest FIFA rankings and now sit 20 places above their weekend opponents.
Others: Tip 2 - Goals - Over/under 2.5 - Under 2.5 goals (Four of the last five matches between the two teams have produced fewer than 2.5 goals)
Tip 3 - Both teams to score: NO (Both sides have found the back of the net in just two of their last eight matchups)
